name: Esteban's Family Jewels
description:
When Esteban's lawyer told him that he would lose everything in the divorce, he never thought it included his precious jewels. Run and Jump through distant lands. Reclaim your family jewels. And with it, your pride.

This is an early prototype version and is by no means complete

Controls

A: Move Left

D: Move Right

W: Jump

Spacebar: Summon Crystal

F2: Screenshot

Esc: Brings up save menu while in-game
